Title: Salut d'Amour
Writer: Sang-Hyeon Lee (screenplay), Je-kyu Kang (screenplay adaptation), Eun-jin Pang (screenplay adaptation)
Actors: Geun-hyeong Park, Yeo-jeong Yoon, Jin-woong Jo, Ji-min Han
Plot: Sung-chil is a grumpy 70-year-old man who lives alone and works part-time at the local supermarket. Jang-soo, owner of the supermarket and president of the city's redevelopment project, has...
